mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.shop_home_code, t.vip_type, t.order_discount, t.to_send_discount, t.score_times, t.all_discount, t.all_flag, t.vip_money_type, t.vip_month_money, t.vip_season_money, t.vip_year_money, t.open_flag, t.name FROM t_shop_vip_base t LEFT JOIN t_shop_home_base_info t2 ON t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code where t2.login_no=#{loginNo} -- LEFT JOIN t_shop_vip_recharge t2 ON t.id=t2.shop_vip_base_id -- LEFT JOIN t_shop_vip_consumer_coupon t3 ON t.id=t3.shop_vip_base_id
-- t2.shop_vip_base_id rcharge_id, -- t2.to_money, -- 送多少钱 -- t2.recharge_money,-- 充值多少钱 -- t3.shop_vip_base_id coupon_id, -- t3.`name` qname,-- 每月领券的名称 -- t3.time_day,-- 有效期 -- t3.to_money_send,-- 消费赠送金额 -- t3.consume_money-- 消费门槛

SELECT CASE WHEN ((SELECT count(t.id) FROM t_shop_vip_recharge t,t_shop_home_base_info t1 where t.shop_home_code=t1.shop_home_code AND t1.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.open_flag='Y')>0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END '储值卡', CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(t3.id) FROM t_shop_vip_base t3,t_shop_home_base_info t2 where t3.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code and t3.open_flag='Y' AND t2.login_no =#{loginNo} )>0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END '会员权益', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_score_setting t,t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo}) AS '积分累计', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_order_coupon t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.del_flag=0 AND t.order_type='DDFQ') AS '订单返券', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_toucan_hd t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.order_type='FGTC' ) AS '复购套餐', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_order_coupon t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.del_flag=0 AND t.order_type='JDLQ') AS '进店领券', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_order_coupon t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.del_flag=0 AND t.order_type='XRLQ') AS '新人领券', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_toucan_hd t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.order_type='JJG') AS '加价购', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_toucan_hd t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.order_type='DEJNZ') AS '第二件N折', 'N' AS '凑单提醒', (SELECT IFNULL(t.open_flag,'N') FROM t_shop_order_coupon t, t_shop_home_base_info t2 WHERE t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.del_flag=0 AND t.order_type='MJHD') AS '订单满减/满减活动', 'N' AS '现时秒杀' FROM DUAL
